docs.text: Greeting From Dawei Currently I am a Ph.D. student at Department of Computer Science, The University of HK, Supervised by Prof. Jia Pan and Prof. Wenping Wang (Co-supervisor). Before that, I recieved B.Eng degree in Computer Science from Dalian Unviersity of Technology in 2018, supervised by Prof. Xin Yang . News! [Jan. 2020] New Paper "A Two-Stage Reinforcement Learning Approach for Multi-UAV Collision Avoidance Under Imperfect Sensing" published on IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters (RA-L) [Jan. 2020] One paper accepted by ICRA 2020 [Aug. 2018] I start my Ph.D. study at HKU Research My research interests lie in Robotics and Machine Learning
